text: Darrin Patrick (December 4, 1970 â€“ May 7, 2020) was an American author and teaching pastor. He was born in Marion, Illinois. He taught at Seacoast Church in Charleston South Carolina. He was a pastor of The Journey, a megachurch in St. Louis, Missouri, which he founded in 2002. He was the chaplain to the St. Louis Cardinals and was the author of several books. Patrick was the vice- president of the Acts 29 Network, an international church planting organization, and a council member of The Gospel Coalition. Patrick shot himself on May 7, 2020 at the age of 49. ==References== ==Other websites== *Seacoast Church Category:1970 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Suicides by firearm in the United States Category:American Christians Category:Educators from Illinois Category:Writers from Illinois
title: Darrin Patrick
